description.p: Returns the number e raised to the power of Number.
Returns e raised to the power of the specified numeric value.

discussion.p: The Exp function calculates e raised to the power of the specified numeric value.

example.caption: Exp() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 Exp(2) AS EXPR1 FROM Products = 7.38905609893065
